content: The Multi-Glazed Gourd is one of the final Gourds you can obtain in Black Myth: Wukong during a first through. It comes with 6 uses and can't be upgraded, making it the Mythical Gourd with the lowest amount of uses.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Multi-Glazed_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Multi-Glazed Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
The Multi-Glazed Gourd is one of the final Gourds you can obtain in Black Myth: Wukong during a first through. It comes with 6 uses and can't be upgraded, making it the Mythical Gourd with the lowest amount of uses.
